trustfund:
TF026795-PHRD-SIERRA LEONE HIV/AIDS
            MULTI-SECTOR RESPONSE PROJECT

abstracts.cdata!:
The HIV/AIDS Response Project for Sierra
            Leone will assist the government to organize a response to
            the growing disease, within the context of the Multi-Country
            HIV/AIDS Program for the Africa Region (MAP II). In
            accordance with the main goal of the MAP, the development
            objectives of this four-year project are to contribute to
            reducing HIV/AIDS prevalence and mitigate the impact of
            HIV/AIDS on persons infected or affected by HIV/AIDS. There
            are four project components. They finance capacity building,
            and policy and program coordination; multi-sector responses
            to HIV/AIDS prevention and care; health sector responses to
            HIV/AIDS, STI/TB, and other opportunistic infection
            management, including prevention and care; and community and
            civil society initiatives (including communities,
            nongovernmental organizations, religious groups, and the
            private sector).
